org.contentmine.graphics.svg.plot

Class AxialBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.graphics.svg.plot.AxialBox
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AxisScaleBox, AxisTickBox

    public class AxialBox
extends java.lang.Object
    managaes the contents of a region associated with an axis. Generally an AnnotatedAxis contains some or all of: * AxisTickBox * AxisTextBox // for scales * AxisTextBox // for titles
    Author:
    pm286
